alert.note: Alert for Harrison; Nicholas (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 6:14PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NICHOLAS AND EAST CENTRAL HARRISON COUNTIES THROUGH 700 PM EDT... At 613 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Carlisle, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Carlisle, Barefoot, Blue Licks Springs, Weston, Ellisville, Pleasant Valley, Headquarters, Sprout, Barterville and Myers. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
